document.full_text: rafael nadal struggled past 148th-ranked qualifier paolo lorenzi 6-7 (5), 6-4, 6-0 in his opening match at the italian open on wednesday, looking far from the form that has helped him dominate on clay for six years.
document.title: nadal struggles to beat qualifier at italian open
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal struggled past 148th-ranked qualifier paolo lorenzi 6-7 (5), 6-4, 6-0 in his opening match at the italian open on wednesday, looking far from the form that has helped him dominate on clay for six years.
